title: Chuang Tang Tu 3 Jiong Jiong Shiguang Ji
synopsis: The rabbit who likes to invent and create, wants to be recognized by Grandpa Rabbit, but every experiment always ends in an oolong failure. In order to prove himself, Chuangtangtu decided to conduct a bold experiment and develop a physical conveyor. As a result, in the experiment, the physical teleporter was accidentally upgraded into a super unstable time jumping machine, which caused a series of chaotic results. In order to prevent this chaotic future, Tangtang and its friends constantly used the time machine to modify the past and change the future. As a result, the more they modify, the more chaotic they are. In this chaotic day at home, in the backyard at home, Tangtang found that he, his father and grandpa These three generations have become the key to saving the world! 　　 This is an adventure about time, a story about understanding. (translated from douban)
